Body:
ctx = zmq.asyncio.Context()
a, b = await zmq_ipc_pipe(ctx, 'ipc://pipe.ipc')
await b.send('foo')
assert await a.recv() == 'foo'
await a.send(eof=True)
with pytest.raises(EOFError):
    await b.recv()
with pytest.raises(EOFError):
    await b.recv()
with pytest.raises(EOFError):
    await a.send('bar')
ctx.destroy()
pytest.mark.asyncio
